name: Praise
description: Praise is a versatile script with variations from Casual (non-connecting) to Formal appeal. With nearly 3400 glyphs, the five stylistic sets gives a powerful solution to the design needs of the graphic design professional. It comes with Latin Character sets including Western, Central, and Vietnamese language support. To contribute, see github.com/googlefonts/praise-script .
author: Robert Leuschke
